trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element used in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> elemento utilizzato nella crittografia XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class represents the `<ReferenceList>` element of an encrypted document XML signature defined by the XML encryption specification.
trans-unit.target: La classe rappresenta ReferenceList il `<ReferenceList>` elemento del documento crittografato della firma XML definita dalla specifica la crittografia XML.

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class contains references to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements that were encrypted by a key contained within another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: La classe ReferenceList contiene riferimenti a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>gli elementi che sono stati crittografati mediante la chiave contenuta all'interno di altra <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>elemento.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class uses <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> elements, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
trans-unit.target: La classe utilizza ReferenceList <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>elementi facciano riferimento <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>elementi, e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>elementi facciano riferimento <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>elementi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>

trans-unit.source: You can add only <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> objects to the ReferenceList collection.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere solo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>oggetti alla raccolta ReferenceList.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli standard di crittografia XML, vedere http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"> </xref> dell'oggetto per la <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to add to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"> </xref> oggetto da aggiungere al <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: La posizione in cui è stato inserito il nuovo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is not a object.
trans-unit.target: La value parametro non è un oggetto.

trans-unit.target: - o - value parametro non è un oggetto.

trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli elementi dal <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"> </xref> oggetto si trova nel <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"> </xref> raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object to an array, starting at a specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi del <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"> </xref> oggetto in una matrice, iniziando in corrispondenza dell'indice matrice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> object that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>oggetto che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: La matrice deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
